values.description: Brokerages provide you with a connection to the market so you can fill trades. Brokerage models simulate the live behavior of a real brokerage.
values.keywords: connection to the market, Brokerage models, the brokerage model validates your orders, fee models, supported order types, security level models, set a brokerage model, Supported asset classes, Support for extended market hours,Trade settlement rules, Custom brokerage models
